nodes.text: Silas Jarrde was a male Twi'lek member of the Balmorran resistance who led a resistance cell in the Sundari Flatlands during the later stages of the fighting on Balmorra during the Galactic War. Though he was skeptical of the Galactic Republic's willingness to help the resistance, he recruited Republic aid in sabotaging the sensor array serving the Balmorran Arms Factory.
Silas Jarrde starts the mission "Critical Sabotage" for Republic players in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
